SELECT E.* FROM ( SELECT ALL_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT A.REHNDN_NO , A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID , C.JOB_NAME , A.REHNDN_RESN , CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(A.REHNDN_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), CHAR) AS REHNDN_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), CHAR) AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), CHAR) AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.BATCH_ID , B.BATCH_NM , D.EXIT_CODE , D.STATUS FROM TN_REHNDN A LEFT OUTER JOIN BATCH_JOB_EXECUTION D ON D.JOB_EXECUTION_ID = A.JOB_EXECUTION_ID , TN_BATCH B , BATCH_JOB_INSTANCE C WHERE A.BATCH_ID = B.BATCH_ID AND A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID = C.JOB_INSTANCE_ID
A.REHNDN_NO LIKE concat('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
A.BATCH_ID LIKE concat('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
B.BATCH_NM LIKE concat('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID LIKE concat('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
D.EXIT_CODE = #searchResultCode#
ORDER BY A.REHNDN_NO DESC ) ALL_LIST ) E LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#
